text: Alloh taolo ʙa ahli Makka, Pajomʙarero az xudason ʙa nazdason firistod, ki u Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam ʙud, nasaʙu rosti va amonatasro medonistand, vale on ciro ki ʙarojason ovard, qaʙulas nakardand, duruƣgujas nomidand, pas azoʙi saxt va gurusnagiju xavf on sitamkoronro faro girift
